ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package French onion soup mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Use low-sodium soup mix if available to control salt content
Let the casserole rest 5 minutes after baking for easier serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a classic comfort casserole. How can we enhance the flavor with fresh herbs or spices while keeping it simple?
